title: Binance Overhauls Stablecoin Trading with Trump-Linked USD1
contentSnippet: The exchange is adding new USD1 trading pairs and replaces BUSD collateral with the token.

title: Klarna Teams With Stripe’s Privy to Build Crypto Wallet ‘For the Masses’
contentSnippet: Swedish fintech firm Klarna is working towards the launch of its own crypto wallet with Stripe-owned wallet infrastructure firm, Privy.

title: El Salvador Partners with Elon Musk’s Grok in AI-Powered Education for 1M Students
contentSnippet: The nation that first adopted bitcoin as legal tender is looking to pioneer AI-powered education in 5,000 Salvadoran schools with xAI’s Grok

title: Bhutan goes for gold, announces sovereign-backed RWA token
contentSnippet: The Himalayan Kingdom mines Bitcoin, holds digital asset reserves, and has embraced blockchain technology to modernize its financial system.

title: Crypto Investment Firm Blockstream to Acquire TradFi Hedge Fund Corbiere Capital
contentSnippet: The planned deal will bring Corbiere’s equity and event-driven strategies under Blockstream’s asset management arm.

title: Robinhood Stock Slides 8% After Big Decline in November Trading Volumes
contentSnippet: Slumps across equity, options and crypto trading in November raised concerns that retail investor momentum may be fading.

title: Texas grid is heating up again, this time from AI, not Bitcoin miners
contentSnippet: ERCOT reported a record surge in large-load requests, with AI data centers surpassing Bitcoin miners and reshaping Texas’s grid planning and reliability outlook.

title: Disney Targets Google Over AI Copyright Violations—Alongside $1 Billion OpenAI Deal
contentSnippet: Disney says Google’s AI used its characters without permission, as it signed a new deal with OpenAI to allow character generation with Sora.

title: Aptos Slumps 7% as Token Unlock Weighs on Sentiment
contentSnippet: Trading volumes jumped 38% above monthly averages as institutional players repositioned ahead of a scheduled token unlock.

title: TON Slips 3.3% to $1.59 as Broader Crypto Market Weakens
contentSnippet: The token is consolidating below resistance at $1.65, with support forming above $1.59, and traders are watching for a breakout above $1.70 to regain momentum.

title: US SEC's Crenshaw takes aim at crypto in final weeks at the agency
contentSnippet: Caroline Crenshaw, the financial agency’s sole remaining Democratic commissioner, is expected to depart in January, 18 months after her official term ended.

title: ICP Extends Decline as Breakdown Below $3.40 Reinforces Bearish Structure
contentSnippet: ICP slid 4.28% as a sharp reversal from early highs pushed the token below short-term support, with volume surging during key inflection points.

title: Belarus blocks ByBit, Bitget, OKX as Russia clamps down on crypto gray area
contentSnippet: Belarus blocked major crypto exchange domains the same day Russia signaled it may ease regulated crypto access requirements while clamping down on the gray market.

title: BNB Drops Below $865 as Crypto Market Moves Lower
contentSnippet: The token is now trading in a tight range, with buyers defending the $864-$867 zone and sellers capping gains near $868.50.

title: Save the Children Introduces Bitcoin Fund to Streamline Crisis Response
contentSnippet: New fund enables Save the Children to hold bitcoin, pilot digital wallets, and speed up emergency aid delivery.

title: Cross-Chain Liquidity Protocol LI.FI Raises $29M in Series A Extension
contentSnippet: The Berlin-based bridging and swap infrastructure provider has now raised $51.7M in total funding and processed more than $60B in onchain volume.

title: Some Bitcoin Buying Firms Are Selling as Losses Pile Up on Paper: Report
contentSnippet: A report found that most Bitcoin-stacking firms sit on unrealized losses, with a handful selling the asset as its price fell last month.

title: Prediction markets bet Bitcoin won’t reach $100K before year’s end
contentSnippet: Bitcoin bull market optimism has suffered since the Oct. 10 crash, as chances of a short-term BTC price rally above $100,000 appeared to be fading.

title: Spanish Police Dismantle Network Linked to Crypto ‘Wrench Attack’ Murder
contentSnippet: Five people have been arrested following a murder and kidnapping in April, with another four charged in Denmark.

title: Coinbase Ending USDC Rewards for Free Users, Will Only Be for Paid Members
contentSnippet: Not all Coinbase users will be able to earn rewards on USDC holdings, as the exchange moves to make it a feature for Coinbase One members.

title: Bitcoin treasuries stall in Q4, but largest holders keep stacking sats
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury adoption slowed during the fourth quarter, but the largest firms continued to accumulate BTC, with public companies now holding over 4.7% of the total Bitcoin supply.

title: Trust Wallet taps Revolut for crypto purchases in Europe
contentSnippet: Trust Wallet’s “zero-fee” crypto purchases through Revolut arrive weeks after the fintech unicorn hit a $75 billion valuation in a private share sale.

title: Ether vs. Bitcoin: ETH price poised for 80% rally in 2026
contentSnippet: Ether's inverse head-and-shoulders pattern and rebound from a key accumulation zone signal a potential 80% rally in 2026.

title: Crypto Is Now Central to Venezuela’s Economy—And Poses Sanctions Risks: TRM
contentSnippet: An informal peer-to-peer crypto economy is now central to Venezuela’s economy, and should be considered as President Trump ratchets up tensions with the country, a new TRM report says.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: US DoJ Indicts Ukrainian Over Russia-Linked Cyberattack Groups That Paid in Crypto
contentSnippet: The individual was allegedly involved in two groups that used Telegram to claim credit for attacks against infrastructure targets in the U.S.

title: Bitcoin due 2026 bottom as exchange volumes grind lower: Analysis
contentSnippet: Bitcoin analysis warned that the next BTC price bottom may appear in 2026 as exchange trading volume enters a long grind lower.

title: Morning Minute: VanEck Leans Into 'Degen' Culture with New ETF
contentSnippet: A basket of assets built around millennial finance, the gig economy and digital gambling has been built into this degen index.

title: New Xiaomi Smartphones Will Come With Sei Crypto Wallets Preinstalled
contentSnippet: The partnership will see a Sei “crypto wallet and discovery app” preinstalled on devices sold outside mainland China and the U.S.

title: Here’s Why Bitcoin Is Falling Despite the Fed's Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Analysts say the Fed’s rate cut was priced in, driving Bitcoin lower as risks like sticky inflation and the 2026 election cycle mount.

title: NYSE、サトシ・ナカモト像を設置　ウォール街の変化示す
contentSnippet: ニューヨーク証券取引所がビットコイン創始者サトシ・ナカモトの像を設置。設置者のトゥエンティワン・キャピタルは約4万BTC保有で世界3位。伝統的金融が仮想通貨を受け入れる象徴的出来事に。

title: テザーとHoneyCoinが提携、アフリカでUSDT決済を拡大
contentSnippet: テザーはHoneyCoinと戦略的提携を発表し、アフリカでのUSDT決済拡大を目指す。HoneyCoinはQRコードや専用端末に対応したPOSネットワークを導入し、加盟店が直接USDTを受け取れる仕組みを構築。まずケニアでサービスを開始し、他市場へ展開予定。現地通貨の変動リスクを避けたいユーザーの需要に応え、アフリカにおけるステーブルコイン普及を加速させる。

title: コインチェックがソラナ（SOL）の取扱いを開始
contentSnippet: コインチェックがソラナ（SOL）の取扱いを開始。販売所・取引所・つみたてに対応し、1万円購入で抽選1万円分のSOLが当たるキャンペーンも実施中。

title: ブータン都市GMC、金裏付けトークン「TER」発行へ　ソラナ活用
contentSnippet: ブータンの特別都市GMCが、金を裏付け資産とする国家支援型トークン「TER」をソラナ基盤で発行。DK Bankが販売・保管を担い、同国のデジタル経済戦略を加速させる取り組みとなる。

title: 仮想通貨取引所ジェミニ、CFTC承認で予測市場参入へ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所ジェミニがCFTCから予測市場運営の承認を取得。関連会社ジェミニ・タイタンを通じて二者択一式イベント契約を提供する。カルシとポリマーケットが急成長する予測市場で、競争が激化している。

title: 仮想通貨業界トップ、米CFTC新設諮問会議に参加へ
contentSnippet: 米CFTCが「CEOイノベーション評議会」を設立し、クラーケンやジェミナイなど仮想通貨業界トップが参加。デリバティブ市場の構造変化やトークン化について議論。仮想通貨担保のパイロットプログラムも開始。

title: レイヤーゼロ（ZRO）とは？スターゲートの使い方・バイバックの仕組みを解説
contentSnippet: レイヤーゼロ（LayerZero）の仕組みやZROトークンのバイバック、スターゲートを使ったブリッジ方法を初心者向けに解説。Stargate買収の背景やリスクまでわかりやすく紹介します。

title: イーロンのスペースX、146億円相当のビットコイン移動　IPO関連か？
contentSnippet: イーロン・マスク氏率いるスペースXが約146億円相当のビットコインを移動した。10月から毎週大規模な送金を継続しており、IPO計画との関連が注目されている。

title: トム・リー氏、「イーサリアムは既に底打ち」　先週690億円相当を購入
contentSnippet: ビットマイン会長トム·リー氏が、イーサリアムは既に底入れしたと発言。同社は先週、約4億6,000万ドル相当のETHを購入し、10月以来最大規模の買い増しを実施。今後10~15年間、ビットコインよりもイーサリアムの将来性に期待を寄せている。

title: FRBの慎重姿勢でビットコイン反落　2026年の利下げは限定的か
contentSnippet: FRBは25bpの利下げを決定したが、パウエル議長の慎重姿勢を受けビットコインは下落した。2026年の追加利下げは1回との見方が広がる中、グラスノードのデータは実現損失が1日5.5億ドルとFTX崩壊時並みの高水準を示す。機関投資家の本格参入で4年サイクル終焉論も加速。
